column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ At around 11:00 pm on the 25th of July
column4: 2019 there were violent clashes between six Chinese workers against another Chinese in the village 1
column5: Sihanoukville.------The victim was identified as Chin Yun Han. The reason behind the attack was because the Chinese workers were angry that they had not been paid salaries.------After the incident
column6: police detained those involved and sent them to the provincial police station to take legal action. ------Post
